title: New: Rejjie Snow x Sun Patzer
body:
It may be less than 90 seconds long, but Rejjie Snow and Sun Patzer’s ‘294’ more than makes up for it’s short duration with it’s outstanding quality.

Having announced his debut EP ‘Rejovich’ will be released in June through independent label Kaya Kaya, Rejjie Snow continues to demonstrate his significant MC abilities on ‘294’. Rapping over beats produced by unknown entity Sun Patzer, apparently a member of the elusive Electric Ark, you can watch the video to ‘294’ below.

Stream / Download the track here –
